tasks.title: Trigger macro list refresh after create/update
evidence: crates/tui/src/app/actions/data_loading.rs:63-68 sets loading=true after MacroCreated but does not dispatch LoadMacros
Macro update path clears loading but does not reload the list, so UI can stay stale
plan: Decide on a single refresh strategy (dispatch LoadMacros or update list in place).
On MacroCreated/MacroUpdated success, trigger a refresh action or re-fetch list.
Ensure loading state toggles correctly during refresh.
Add tests asserting list refreshes after create/update.
Verify by running `make test` and confirming macro refresh tests pass.
notes: Why: The UI can stay stale after create/update, and loading is set true without a follow-up action.
Minimal fix: Dispatch LoadMacros after create/update success or update list directly.
Acceptance: After create/update, macros list reflects changes and loading resets.

tasks.title: Add make type-check target and include it in make ci
evidence: make type-check -> make: *** No rule to make target `type-check'.
AGENTS.md:40-48 requires make type-check and make ci to run it
Makefile:130-148 notes 'No separate type-check' and omits the step
plan: Add a type-check target (cargo check --workspace --all-targets --all-features --locked).
Update make ci to invoke type-check per AGENTS.md contract.
Update Makefile help output to include type-check.
Run targeted tests/lint to ensure no regressions in CI flow.
Verify by running `make type-check` and `make ci` (once lint issues are fixed).
notes: Why: The documented contract says type-check is required, but the target is missing.
Minimal fix: Add the target and call it from ci/help.
Acceptance: make type-check exists and is executed by make ci.

tasks.title: Align make clean behavior with documented Cargo.lock deletion
evidence: Makefile:62-65 clean target only runs cargo clean and removes target/
AGENTS.md:52 states make clean deletes Cargo.lock by design
plan: Decide whether to change Makefile or documentation (AGENTS.md is the shared contract).
If changing Makefile, remove Cargo.lock (and other lock files if applicable) in clean target.
Update Makefile help text to reflect the behavior.
Confirm no unintended deletions occur for non-Rust files.
Verify by running `make clean` and confirming Cargo.lock is removed.
notes: Why: Current behavior contradicts the documented contract, confusing users.
Minimal fix: Make clean remove Cargo.lock or update AGENTS.md if behavior is intentional.
Acceptance: Makefile and AGENTS.md agree on clean behavior.

tasks.title: Add real-time search support to TUI and CLI
evidence: Splunk REST API supports search_mode=realtime for real-time searches.
Current search implementation only supports historical searches.
Real-time searches are essential for monitoring and alerting use cases.
plan: Add search_mode parameter to search endpoint and client methods.
Add --realtime flag to CLI search command with optional window duration.
Add realtime mode toggle to TUI search screen.
Implement streaming results display for realtime searches.
Add tests and update documentation.
